properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 7:37PM CST until February 4 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could produce blowing
snow.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, Cimarron County. In Texas, Dallam and
Hartley Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty north winds could produce some
blowing snow and periods of reduced visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM CST TUESDAY
